function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak public health surveillance","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Strengthen public health surveillance through research and capacity building","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance systems, data analytics, and AI","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of inter-institutional collaboration","Impact":"Reduced quality of surveillance and preparedness","Mitigation":"Enhance collaboration between inter-regional and national public health and emergency management plans","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data sharing systems, and collaborative tools","People":"Public health and emergency management officials","Owner":"Public health and emergency management authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate economic and social impact management","Impact":"Long-term economic and social impacts of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement evidence-based public policy measures and innovative approaches for sustainable recovery","Technologies":"Economic modeling tools, impact assessment software, and social impact analysis platforms","People":"Policy makers, economists, and social impact analysts","Owner":"Government agencies and policy making bodies"}]}
